```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
dcry <- read_html("http://ctfs.si.edu/Public/DataDict/data_dict.php")

  html_nodes(xpath = "//table//td") %>%
  html_text() %>% 
  matrix(ncol = 5)


```


```{r}
library(rvest)
lego_movie <- read_html("http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1490017/")
```

```{r}
lego_movie %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  .[[2]] %>%
  html_table()
```
